text: The Versailles University Foundation (French: Fondation Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines) has been created in 2011.Création de la fondation partenariale Fondation UVSQ It is to promote scientific and public interest activities in medicine, sciences, disability, sustainable development. ==History== The Foundation has been created in 2011. The first scholarships have been given in 2014, in order to help students to go abroad. Between October 2014 and June 2015, the Foundation works to develop the library.LA COLLECTE DES BIBLIOTHÈQUES DE L'UNIVERSITÉ VERSAILLES-SAINT-QUENTIN PROGRESSE In December 2015, a laboratory is created. == References == ==Further reading== * Official website Category:University of Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines
title: Versailles University Foundation
